synopsis.text: Akaneâ€™s ordinary life takes a dramatic turn when she is mysteriously transported to the mystical realm of Kyou, where she discovers her true identity as the Ryuujin no Miko, the Priestess of the Dragon God. Alongside her protectors, the Hachiyou, Akane must confront the menacing demon Akuram, who seeks to harness the devastating power of Azusa, a woman capable of absorbing human energy. In this thrilling adventure, Akane and her guardians must thwart Akuram's sinister plans and restore peace to Kyou, lest Azusa's unchecked power brings about the destruction of humanity. As they navigate this fantastical world filled with monsters and demons, Akane and her companions must summon the four gods, Seiryuu, Suzaku, Byakko, and Genbu, to protect Kyou from the looming darkness. The race against time begins, as Akane and her allies strive to prevent an impending catastrophe.
